name: Chic London Escorts
overview: Welcome to Chic, the elite agency with a difference! Here you will find the very best high class escorts in London, at the most competitive rates. The ladies you see on our website are exquisite and have been specially selected to represent our prestigious agency because they meet the high standards we set. Every girl at Chic is beautiful, discreet, professional, friendly and open minded - exactly what men look for. Our stunning London escort girls are perfect for any occasion; whether you want a quiet night in or a stunner on your arm at a social event, you will not go wrong with Chic London. Our ladies are eager to meet you as they all love what they do, and absolutely adore the companionship of gentlemen. There are so many reasons to book with Chic, as our well respected regular customers would all tell you!
